Articles.Content: hi i'm new and expect to have fun. but i have no idea what to do:confused:

Build rockets. When they crash, figure out why and build better ones. That's pretty much all there is to it.

(Though if you have more specific questions, feel free to ask. )

Welcome to the forums!

Vanamonde pretty much has it covered right there. Also, feel free to check out the many tutorials I've collected in the Drawing Board, which is linked in my signature.

Hope this helps!

... and if you can't figure out why the rocket crashes, build planes!

Welcome to the forum!

If you have no idea what to do have a look at the in game tutorials, Scott Manley on YouTube and these forums and then try and go to the Mun.

Good luck and have fun and don't be afraid to ask anything.
And if you have some time to waste come to the game section of the space lounge...oh and...
how do you do that thing down at the bottom of your post?

how do you do that thing down at the bottom of your post?

Click on settings in the top right corner, then, on the leftahand side of the page around halfway down, there should be something called "Edit signature", click it and you can type anything you want or post an image URL

Of note, you'll only get access to that feature once we've confirmed that you're not some sort of sneaky spambot trying to slip through the filter. You should get full profile permissions once you've had five posts approved on the forums.
